website_summaries.verdict: With its rugged construction and hardware, cigar lovers on the go will appreciate this model for its handy features that protect and maintain humidity.
pros: A compact model that is built to travel
Holds humidity well thanks to a humidifier disk and airtight and watertight seal
cons: Doesn't come with instructions  for the humidifier disk
Though rated for up to 15 cigars, slots are small and may not fit that many

customer_reviews.title: Item sent not the same as description.  Plastic hinges/ fake Automatic Pressure Equalization Valve
customer_reviews.text: Item I received did not have Stainless Steel Hinges just plastic. The Automatic Pressure Equalization Valve under handle pictured is just for looks and is just screwed into box. Item shipped does not match item received. Definitely cheaply made. I am deployed in Afghanistan so not easy to send back. I will have to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad/Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Product went from a great item then replaced by a much lesser quality item for the same price.
customer_reviews.text: Product went from a great item then replaced by a much lesser quality item for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Gerardiello

customer_reviews.title: No humidity disk.
customer_reviews.text: Like most of the people who have written reviews, I am deployed and ordered this. The humidity disk didnt arrive with the case. It is the quality you'd expect for $20. I cant return it easily so I will be keeping it and probably just use a sponge with my propylene glycol. I will absolutely change my review if the company fixes this situation.
customer_reviews.author: mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Can not hold 15 cigars
customer_reviews.text: This humidor is not actually capable of holding 15 cigars properly. If you load that many they stack up until the top piece of foam is protruding at least an inch out the top of the humidor. When you try to close the lid the round humidifier crushes the 3 cigars in the middle of the top row.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it in Afghanistan. It is air tight and comes with plenty of padding to add and remove depending on how many cigars you have in it. Design is simple and not over branded. Disappointed that it doesn't have a meter for gauging the humidity, but you could put one inside if you cared to.
customer_reviews.author: Christian L.

customer_reviews.title: Great little case
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for a friend that travels and enjoys cigars. The case is sturdy & well designed to protect the cigars and the foam is firm enough to hold them in place while not crushing them in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunessy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, I use the separate gell sticks ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, I use the separate gell sticks and with this tight enclosure I am over a month with out adding water.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Bergo

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidor For Beginner!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect humidor for beginner! Keeps cigars in perfect shape for a very long time. Only negative is because it will not fit 15 cigars unless they are very very small and thin. But I don't go anywhere that I need more than 10 anyways so works great for me! Even has 2 places for locks during travel!
customer_reviews.author: VJGBK31

customer_reviews.title: Great travel case
customer_reviews.text: Compact, durable, and holds humidity level really well. Great travel case for the man in your life.
customer_reviews.author: MotorCityChic72

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my dad because he loves to smoke ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad because he loves to smoke and to go camping. He uses this box everyday, it is water proof and even floats if you drop it in the water.
customer_reviews.author: David Breaux

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very handy size for an outdoor venue. Good latches and easy to maintain correct humidity. Extra foam was included but gets left behind if the humidor is filled with 40-60 ring gauge stogies, ergo the "capacity" in the write-up is a bit overstated.
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Leith

customer_reviews.title: Guardsman Travel Humidor
customer_reviews.text: I love this size. When I don't want to carry my much bigger travel humidor this is the one I go with.
customer_reviews.author: courage

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for vacations, every time i take a trip it goes with me to collect cigars everywhere i go. Cigars stay nice a humid and it does a great job locking in freshness. When i crack it open in a room, everyone is welcome by the aromas of great handmade cigars.
customer_reviews.author: Andres M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Plenty of capacity and almost bulletproof.
customer_reviews.author: Keith T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Maintenance
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I barely have to do any maintenance to maintain an optimal humidity. It's stayed at 72% for the past 3 months with almost no effort. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P Steinbach

customer_reviews.title: great protection and with water pillow keep cigar in the ...
customer_reviews.text: take with me on deployments, great protection and with water pillow keep cigar in the right condition
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Mobile Humidor
customer_reviews.text: If your looking to keep cigars in the car, This is what you need. I can't believe how cheap it is and how great it works
customer_reviews.author: Francis Urrrutia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mini humidor works great. Almost better than the regular humidor
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Wiprud

customer_reviews.title: Great case for stoggies.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sturdy unit. Protects the sticks very well. Like everyone says if you want the max capacity you must remove all but the very bottom and lid foam.
customer_reviews.author: Terlbear

customer_reviews.title: ... if you're a Churchill kind of guy i don't recommend you fill it up but its as tough as ...
customer_reviews.text: holds 15 tight if you're a Churchill kind of guy i don't recommend you fill it up but its as tough as a pelican case if you ask me. great for packing when you don't know who's handling your baggage.
customer_reviews.author: tupac

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor. I would recommend a hydrometer as well ...
customer_reviews.text: Great humidor. I would recommend a hydrometer as well just to be able to monitor the humidity, but this is great if you travel often.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply built
customer_reviews.text: Nothing spectacular, no instructions on placing the moisture control. I expected a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiea S. Copra

customer_reviews.title: Great Carrier only reason for 4 star it didn't fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Carrier only reason for 4 star it didn't fit 15 comfortably more like 10 all in all good products for the price
customer_reviews.author: Aaron777

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome travel case, add a moisture pack and you are good to go. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Steve O

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel humi
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy little travel humidor. Tight seal keeps humidity perfectly. My only complaint is that the 15 capacity is for very small cigars or cigarillos,unless you don't use the dividers. But honestly that is of small consequence. It does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Goggins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Seals good. Great little travel humidor. Would recommend product.
customer_reviews.author: JLane

customer_reviews.title: For people on the rood all the time
customer_reviews.text: I really like this this Guardsman its easy to maintain and it keeps everything nice and fresh it fits in tight places and its durable as well it holds all my cigars that i need so that's why I am giving it a five it's everything I need in a case
customer_reviews.author: chad vanderlaan

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy box. It's a good buy
customer_reviews.text: It took a quick google search to figure out how to get the humidifier disk to work but once you get that done the box does exactly what it should do. Very sturdy box. It's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its perfect but no way to fit 15 cigars, 10 max
customer_reviews.author: MC-DAD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy lightweight travel cigar case. Durable too. My husband takes it everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: ... a stretch but all in all I am very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: 15 is a stretch but all in all I am very pleased with the purchase. Took it out on a 4 day camping trip, money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Don Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Could have used some recommendations for charging the humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis bulger

customer_reviews.title: a must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new travel humidor. Finally I have something that holds more than 5 sticks. I purchased this model because it has a handle which I figured was appropriate for its size as opposed to many other model which don't have one. The manual pressure valve is a plus when it comes to air travel. I highly recommend this product. The humidifier is also very good quality and with a little PG solution should work nicely to maintain a nice 70/70
customer_reviews.author: briandrew1

customer_reviews.title: Item delivered as expected and in excellent conditions.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciated the deal too much. Item delivered as expected and in excellent conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Vinicius Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Works great with humidity tube
customer_reviews.text: At first I was like, OMG A WATERPROOF CIGAR CASE, and i bought this. It looks a little trashy... not something to impress the guys with haha. It does its job though, nice airtight cigar case.
customer_reviews.author: CMCROW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent carry humidor
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to take your cigars to your friends or out. I take the foam out to get more in and I put the water in ahead of time so it won't get the cigars wet. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Robert Del Presto

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you want to take your trophies with you. Bought it for a few week trip from IL to Cali and was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lives4trauma

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, needed it for a trip and worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, needed it for a trip and worked perfect. Didnt use it for cigars but worked great for vape stuff
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was ok no instructions has 3 layers but you really can only use two it's ol
customer_reviews.author: Derek Yancey

customer_reviews.title: It was ok not really sure what the case is ...
customer_reviews.text: It was ok not really sure what the case is really air tight but it will work for now
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: no instructions
customer_reviews.text: No instructions on how or how much to fill the filter With Water. Ended up buying one of them gel tubes
customer_reviews.author: shanur

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: there is no way that you will be able to fit 15 cull size cigars in this case
customer_reviews.author: Owen A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Travel Humidor I have owned. Extremely well built.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a number of "travel humidors" over the years and this is the highest quality one I have owned so far. Other TH's tended to have latch issues (they would come off/separate after only a few uses) and the stated capacity never was accurate. This TH is extremely well built and very sturdy. The pressure release for altitude shifts is nice, though not essential. It seals better than any others I have owned and unlike in the past, I have no concerns about tying this to my belt while wading into water. I have gifted this to a number of good friend who had had the same issues with other TH's and the responses have been unanimously positive.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value, sturdy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband after reading many reviews. He loves it. It holds 15 cigars. He leaves one tray empty to put his cutter and lighter in the chest so he can easily transport his cigars and tools. It looked smaller than I expected, but my husband said it's just the right size for a travel humidor. He was also happy that he could fit cigars that are 7 inches long in the box. (Churchill size). This box kept 75% humidity for almost a week with one Boveda pack even after opening it several times.
customer_reviews.author: Paula D

customer_reviews.title: Works great, seals well and even has purge valve
customer_reviews.text: Works great, seals well and even has purge valve. Dropped mine in the lake by accident and not a drip got inside. Excellent value and a great box, overall i'm very pleased. Note, you can probably fit 15 if you remove one of the stages of foam or if they are thinner cigars. You can fit 15 in it but 10 or so is more realistic. It also won't fit really long cigars so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Cabe B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Must have for travelers. I always take it with me for short getaways. Fits 10 60-ring cigars
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit 15 cigars
customer_reviews.text: I could only fit 10 cigars not the 15 advertised. I took this on my 7 night cruise and it did work, I just wanted to have 15 cigars with me not 10. I would probably give this 4 stars if were advertised as a10 cigar humidor.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute
customer_reviews.text: Will hold about half of the amount of cigars and they say it will
customer_reviews.author: Stan Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Excelente for my cigars
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of time using it every day without any issue!!, you can put no more than 10 Toro or Churchill cigars but anyway is a great protection for cigars.
customer_reviews.author: Juan A. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Humidor
customer_reviews.text: This Humidor is awesome and I am going to buy another one. I bought the one for on the go but will purchase another one for the house. I would recommend this product and you will not be disappointed. Outstanding product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: FREESTYLE

customer_reviews.title: 10 Cigars Max
customer_reviews.text: There is no way this travel humidor holds 15 cigars. Even small ring gauge cigars like Churchills will not fit 3 rows deep.
customer_reviews.author: CA Yanks Fan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Keeps my cigars at a good 71%
customer_reviews.text: After being fed up with my cheap wooden humidor I thought I would purchase a new one. I travel a lot so I wanted something that was more portable. This Humidor is not only portable but water proof and also looks good! I have used this for several months and it keeps my cigars at a good level!!
customer_reviews.author: Speedy

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for but still quality.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the eagle emblem in the center was more than what it is. It’s just a sticker and it was crooked when I got it. However all in all a decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for myself and gave one to a friend deploying in the military. We both love it. It seals well and protects the cigars. I live in AZ and I can keep cigars fresh in this for a few weeks using another brand of gell humindification tube.
customer_reviews.author: Goldy

customer_reviews.title: I think it is perfect for small cigars
customer_reviews.text: I think it is perfect for small cigars, stick large ones in there and you're in trouble. I don't believe that you can fit as many as they say.
customer_reviews.author: Marie246

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter / travel humidor! Definitely got me started until I built a wineador. Just toss in a 65% Boveda packets and you’re good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my cigars fresh. It travels well inside suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great box, like it much better than humi bags ...
customer_reviews.text: Great box, like it much better than humi bags Throw the disc provided in the trash and use gel sticks or humi packets
customer_reviews.author: Hossie

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for Dad as a gift. He loves it and I got one for myself. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven F.

customer_reviews.title: The seal is pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Just does what it is supposed to do. What else can you ask for. The seal is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: H. Karaca Kestelli

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Travel Humidor
customer_reviews.text: This is just the size I was looking for. I really like the nice tight clasps. The Humidor is all I will ever need.
customer_reviews.author: EBCIII

customer_reviews.title: Good size. Says 10-15 sticks
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Says 10-15 sticks...I get 10 Robusto ring gauge comfortably. It appears t be well made.
customer_reviews.author: JJK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, keeping humidity perfectly. Also, better than most you would buy elsewere.
customer_reviews.author: Lucian McDearmon

customer_reviews.title: holds about 10 cigars comfortably with a humidifier pouch and lighter
customer_reviews.text: Has a very tight water proof ceal . very durable . i take it with me fishing and hunting . holds about 10 cigars comfortably with a humidifier pouch and lighter , cutter . I took the foam out of mine so it could fit 15 if I need it to .
customer_reviews.author: Steve Robinson jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not much room for many cigars but great for keeping a few cigars on the boat!
customer_reviews.author: William McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Tough enough to go any where and your cigars are still fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it should be. Well built and hold humidity. You're not going to get fifteen 7X60 sticks in it but it will hold 12 of them. would hold 15 smaller sticks though.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great product for cigars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for cigars, I do a fair share of off shore fishing, great for travel & also a home use humidor.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome! Made a really nice present for someone who loves cigars(:
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Flores

customer_reviews.title: Durable, but limited cigar capacity.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, has good seal, strong and durable. However it will not hold 15 cigars unless ther the smaller ones, and even that would be a stretch. If you use the inside disk humidifier it tends to crush the top cigars, so set the smaller smokes on top row. Other than that this product serves its purpose and will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: joel rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Best cigar case!
customer_reviews.text: Excelent cigar case. They are one of the best in the market and they keep your cigars fresh and with a good humidity. Definitely recomended for anyone that travels and wants to keep their cigars quality
customer_reviews.author: Gadget advisor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but there is no way this holds more than half of the cigars it claims.
customer_reviews.author: W. Design

customer_reviews.title: so good. It's a convenient way to take your cigars ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It's a convenient way to take your cigars on the go. We'll see how it does keeping them fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos
